summary.span: 表示分散式環境中端點之間的通訊單位。

span.span: Represents the unit of communication between endpoints in a distributed environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供在網路上傳送者和接收者之間進行任意資訊通訊的方法。The class provides a means of communicating arbitrary information between a sender and a receiver on a network. 它可以用於轉送資訊、建議或要求動作或要求資料。It can be used to relay information, suggest or demand a course of action, or request data. 物件的結構表示 SOAP 封套。The structure of a object represents a SOAP envelope. 它是由兩個不同的部分組成的：訊息的本文和標頭的選擇性集合，由 類別表示。It consists of two distinct parts: the message's body and an optional collection of headers, represented by the class. 訊息內容是從傳送者傳送到接收者的應用程式定義資料。The message content is application-defined data sent from a sender to a receiver. 訊息標頭可讓系統和應用程式擴充性符合多變的需求，因為您可以將程式碼定義成操作及回應特定的標頭。The message headers enable system and application extensibility to meet the changing requirements, because you can define code to manipulate and respond to specific headers. 您還可以定義自己的標頭。You can also define your own headers. 訊息標頭會和訊息的內容一起序列化或還原序列化。Message headers are serialized or deserialized along with the contents of the message. 訊息會使用特定的格式進行接收及傳送。Messages are received and sent in particular formats. 提供兩種格式的支援：以標準文字為基礎的 XML 格式和以二進位為基礎的 XML 格式。Support is provided for two formats: the standard text-based XML format and a binary-based XML format. 物件可以用來表示 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2 封套。The object can be used to represent both SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2 envelopes. 請注意， 的執行個體會在建立時固定，並且繫結至特定的 SOAP 版本。Note that an instance of is fixed upon creation and is bound to a specific SOAP version. 屬性表示訊息的 SOAP 版本。The property represents the SOAP version of the message. 物件可以使用 方法序列化到外部存放區。A object can be serialized to an external store by using the method. 雖然訊息的屬性也可以序列化，但是必須個別進行識別和序列化。Properties of the message can also be serialized, but they have to be individually identified and serialized separately. 使用 ，即可還原序列化訊息以建立記憶體中 物件。Deserializing a message to create an in-memory object can be done using . 屬性也必須個別進行還原序列化，並手動新增至特定 執行個體的屬性集合。Properties must also be deserialized individually and manually added to the property collection for the specific instance. 物件的大小是由所傳輸的資料大小決定。The size of a object is fixed to the size of data it is transmitting. 每個本文都會模型化成 的執行個體，而且對於 執行個體正在包裝的資料流大小沒有預先定義的限制。Every body is modeled as an instance of , with no predefined limit on the size of the stream that the instance is wrapping. 然而，特定的通道提供者可以對所處理的訊息大小設定限制。However, specific channel providers can have a limit on the size of messages that they process. 可加上由已檢查並處理訊息的實體所產生之有用資訊的註解。A can be annotated with useful information generated by an entity that has examined and processed the message. 這個功能是由 和 屬性提供。This functionality is provided by the and properties. 集合表示訊息上的一組 SOAP 標頭。The collection represents the set of SOAP headers on the message. 屬性表示訊息上的一組處理等級附註。The property represents the set of processing-level annotations on the message. 由於標頭中的資訊會在網路上傳輸，因此檢查標頭的實體必須支援該標頭所使用通訊協定的基礎版本。Because information in headers is transmitted on the wire, an entity that examines a header must support the underlying version(s) of the protocols used by the header. 然而，屬性會提供與版本更加無關的方法來註解訊息。However, properties provide a more version-independent way of annotating a message. 如果要建立 執行個體，請使用其中一種 方法。To create a instance, use one of the methods. 建議訊息消費者在完成存取訊息的內容時，一定要呼叫 。It is recommended that a consumer of a message always call when the consumer is finished accessing the contents of the message. 這個動作會釋放與訊息存留期有密切關係的有限系統資源 (例如通訊端、具名管道)。This action frees finite system resources (for example, sockets, named pipes) that are tied to the lifetime of the message. 給衍生自此類別之 Managed C++ 使用者的特別說明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 請將您的清除程式碼置於 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort)，而不是解構函式。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用解構函式，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 。Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用非參考成員，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 。Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用完成項，但如果您要加入完成項，請隱藏建置警告並從 (On)(Begin)Close (和/或 OnAbort) 呼叫 和完成項本身，以模擬原本可能自動產生的 行為。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範使用通道處理站傳送訊息和讀取回覆的用戶端。The following code example shows a client that uses the channel factory to send a message and read the reply. [!code-csharp[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/cs/client.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/vb/client.vb#0)]

summary.span: 關閉 並釋放所有資源。

span.span: Closes the and releases any resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 確實有完成項，它會造成當訊息進行記憶體回收時呼叫 。The does have a finalizer, which causes to be called for you when the message is garbage-collected. 這並非最佳做法，因為 .NET Framework 的記憶體回收 (GC) 機制不一定會在您用完非記憶體之系統資源的時候執行。This is non-optimal, as the .NET Framework's Garbage Collection (GC) mechanism does not necessarily run when you run out of system resources other than memory. 因此，當完成訊息的內容時，您一定要呼叫這個方法。For this reason, you should always call this method when finished with the contents of the message. 方法是 ( 也會實作此處置) 的同義資料表 (Synonym)。The method is a synonym for (which also implements). 在處置此訊息時，此訊息也會處置用於建構本文的物件。The message also disposes the object that was used to construct the body when it is disposed. 在關閉之後，如果您呼叫任何方法或存取訊息的任何屬性，便會擲回 。An is thrown if you call any method or access any properties of the message once it is closed. 在關閉訊息之後，呼叫與訊息有關之其他物件的任何方法或存取其任何屬性 (例如針對本文或標頭所傳回的訊息標頭集合、訊息屬性值或 執行個體)，都會出現未定義的行為。Calling any method or accessing any properties of other objects related to the message once it is closed, (such as message header collection, message property values, or instances returned for the body or for a header) has undefined behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何建立訊息、將訊息傳送至服務以及接收回應訊息。The following code example shows how to create a message, send it to a service and receive a response message. 這時會顯示回應訊息內容，然後關閉訊息。The response message content is displayed and then the message is closed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以有零或多個標頭 (當做擴充機制使用)，以便在應用程式特定的訊息中傳遞資訊。A can have zero or more headers that are used as an extension mechanism to pass information in messages that is application-specific. 您可以藉由呼叫 方法，使用 將訊息標頭新增至訊息中。You can use to add message headers to a message by calling the method. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 會提供許多預先定義的訊息標頭下, 表所示。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) provides a number of predefined message headers, as shown in the following table. |標頭名稱Header Name|包含標頭名稱。Contains the header name.| |-----------------|-------------------------------| |以To|包含此訊息所針對的角色。Contains the role that the message is targeting.| |動作Action|提供應該如何處理此訊息的說明。Provides a description of how the message should be processed.| |FaultToFaultTo|包含錯誤應該傳送之目標節點的位址。Contains the address of the node to which faults should be sent.| |從From|包含傳送訊息之節點的位址。Contains the address of the node that sent the message.| |要求Request|指出此訊息是否為要求。Indicates whether the message is a request.| |MessageIDMessageID|包含此訊息的唯一 ID。Contains the unique ID of the message.| |RelatesToRelatesTo|包含與此訊息相關之訊息的 ID。Contains the IDs of messages that are related to this message.| |ReplyToReplyTo|包含應該針對要求傳送回覆之目標節點的位址。Contains the address of the node to which a reply should be sent for a request.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範使用通道處理站傳送訊息和讀取回覆的用戶端。The following code example shows a client that uses the channel factory to send a message and read the reply. [!code-csharp[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/cs/client.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/vb/client.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於標頭中的資訊會在網路上傳輸，因此檢查標頭的實體必須支援該標頭所使用通訊協定的基礎版本。Because information in headers is transmitted on the wire, an entity that examines a header must support the underlying version(s) of the protocols used by the header. 然而，屬性會提供與版本更加無關的方法來註解訊息。However, properties provide a more version-independent way of annotating a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為 物件的本文為資料流，所以它只可以讀取或寫入一次。Because the body of a object is a stream, it can only be read or written once. 這可以藉由維護 物件的目前狀態來強制進行。This is enforced by maintaining the current state of the object. 當 物件處於 狀態時，便可以讀取、寫入或複製此物件。A object can be read, written, or copied when in the state. 其他的狀態為 、 和 ，表示各自的動作已經執行過一次。Other states are , and , which means that the respective action has been performed already once.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您完成使用 後，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 這個方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。This method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫這個方法，您必須釋放所有對讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，位於。After calling this method, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the resided in. > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫這個方法。Always call this method before you release your last reference to the . 否則，在記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法之前，不會釋放它正在使用的資源。Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值對訊息是固定不變的。This value is immutable for the message. 可能有兩個版本值： 和 ，它們分別對應至 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2。There are two possible values for the version: and that correspond to SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2 respectively. 了解基礎的 SOAP 版本是很重要的，因為 的結構與 SOAP 訊息的結構關係密切。Knowing the underlying SOAP version is important because the structure of is firmly correlated with that of a SOAP message. > [!IMPORTANT] > 繼承者必須注意，在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法會為訊息的 SOAP 版本傳回 物件。Inheritors must note that when overridden in a derived class, this method returns a object for the SOAP version of the message.
